attributes.review: this is SCARY😳😳first thing i see when opening up the app was this ORANGE RACIST MAN!!😓😓 i got so scared that i literally fell down the stairs and hit my head against a wall!! now my phone’s BROKEN. never download this app😾😾

attributes.review: this app took 2 weeks to download and kept crashing every time i opened it. when i finally got it to stay open it glitched and wiped everything from my phone, including my voicemail box which contained my grandmothers last words. remove this app immediately
attributes.title: actually horrific
